attributes.action: Allow a public vote of no confidence in this shambolic Conservative government.
attributes.additional_details: I no longer have faith or trust in this shambolic Conservative party and government. I'm not looking to replace the leader I would like the country to have an opportunity to have the right to say enough is enough. The constant lies and ineptitude that has been shown has in my opinion undermined our parliamentary system. You can't lead without the trust and consent of the voting public and I hereby revoke my consent.
attributes.background: I as well as many have lost trust in the Conservative government and I believe the British voting public are entitled to an early general election.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments, which includes calling for Ministers or the Government to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Hold a general election in December 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597916
